info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 13 at 5:28PM CDT until April 14 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...The combination of a clearing sky, light winds and temperatures in the lower to mid 30s will result in frost formation. Temperatures could briefly fall below freezing around sunrise. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and western Arkansas. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
